content.query:
-- Run query on Round Robin distributed table
SELECT [PULocationID]
	, DATENAME(WEEKDAY, tpepPickupDate)
	, AVG(
			DATEDIFF(SECOND, tpepPickupDate, tpepDropOffDate)
		 )
FROM prod.YellowTaxis_RoundRobin
GROUP BY [PULocationID]
	, DATENAME(WEEKDAY, tpepPickupDate)
GO

-- Run query on Hash distributed table
SELECT [PULocationID]
	, DATENAME(WEEKDAY, tpepPickupDate)
	, AVG(
			DATEDIFF(SECOND, tpepPickupDate, tpepDropOffDate)
		 )
FROM prod.YellowTaxis_Hash
GROUP BY [PULocationID]
	, DATENAME(WEEKDAY, tpepPickupDate)
GO
